section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:Kisra (Khusrau king of Persia) would die and Qaisar (Ceasar King of Rome) would die; there would be no Qaisar after him, but, by the One in Whose Hand is my life, you would spend their treasures in the cause of Allah. This hadith has been transmitted on the authority of Zuhri
